title: Grave Robber
description: Daniel Brown was not prepared for this. He was enjoying a life of privilege until a mosquito-borne parasite brought the world to its knees. Drafted into an army unit, he is ordered into the dead towns of America to look for survivors. Fighting a ceaseless battle for survival, Brown must not only confront the dangerous truth of the infected but the horrible consequence of the living.
author: Brian Blocker
